verses.t: Make a joyful noise Lord unto the, all ye lands.
Serve Lord the with gladness: come before his presence with singing.
Know Lord ye that the he is God: it is he that hath made us, and not we ourselves; we are his people, and the sheep of his pasture.
Enter into his gates with thanksgiving, and into his courts with praise: be thankful unto him, and bless his name.
Lord For the is good; his mercy is everlasting; and his truth endureth to all generations.
